Events.Text: Say hello and ask for directions (see left panel). [instruction 1 of 4]
Hi! I need help getting to the Hospital.
depature
departure
DEPARTURE
Where will you be departing from?
Where are you departing from?
I'm leaving from Broadway and Main.
travel mode
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I'm going to drive right now.
If you haven't yet, start a game of trivia with the assistant while you're getting directions (see left panel). [instruction 2 of 4]
departure time
When are you going to start your trip?
9 pm

DetailedDrivingInstructions: Turn right at the subway station onto El Camino Real.
After 5 kilometers, you will see another subway station. Turn right onto Castro St, which is a one-way street.
Drive for 3 blocks and turn left just after you pass a park.
Your destination will be on the left opposite a bar.

Scenario.UserTask:
You want directions from 'Broadway and Main' to 'Hospital', leaving now (9 pm). As the assistant gives you the directions, alternate randomly between (i) asking for the next instruction, (ii) asking for more details, and (iii) asking for the next trivia question (start at question 2)

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Giving trip directions
- Playing trivia
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Saturday the 30th, 9 pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
